mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM contract_product_c WHERE CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID ) cpnum, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ext_cproduct_c WHERE CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID IN ( SELECT CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID FROM contract_product_c WHERE CONTRACT_ID = c.CONTRACT_ID ) ) epnum, c.* FROM contract_c c

SELECT c.*, t.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID,t.CONTRACT_ID,t.FACTORY_NAME,t.CONTRACTOR,t.PHONE,t.PRODUCT_NO,t.PRODUCT_DESC,t.PRODUCT_IMAGE,t.CNUMBER,t.PACKING_UNIT,t.PRICE,t.AMOUNT, t.EXT_CPRODUCT_ID,t.EXT_FACTORY_NAME,t.EXT_CONTRACTOR,t.EXT_PHONE,t.EXT_PRODUCT_NO,t.EXT_PRODUCT_DESC,t.EXT_PRODUCT_IMAGE,t.EXT_CNUMBER,t.EXT_PACKING_UNIT,t.EXT_PRICE,t.EXT_AMOUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM contract_c) c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID,cp.CONTRACT_ID, cp.FACTORY_NAME,cp.CONTRACTOR,cp.PHONE,cp.PRODUCT_NO,cp.PRODUCT_DESC,cp.PRODUCT_IMAGE,cp.CNUMBER,cp.PACKING_UNIT,cp.PRICE,cp.AMOUNT, ep.EXT_CPRODUCT_ID,ep.FACTORY_NAME AS EXT_FACTORY_NAME,ep.CONTRACTOR AS EXT_CONTRACTOR,ep.PHONE AS EXT_PHONE,ep.PRODUCT_NO AS EXT_PRODUCT_NO,ep.PRODUCT_DESC AS EXT_PRODUCT_DESC,ep.PRODUCT_IMAGE AS EXT_PRODUCT_IMAGE,ep.CNUMBER AS EXT_CNUMBER,ep.PACKING_UNIT AS EXT_PACKING_UNIT,ep.PRICE AS EXT_PRICE,ep.AMOUNT AS EXT_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT cp.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID,cp.CONTRACT_ID,cp.PRODUCT_NO, cp.PRODUCT_DESC,cp.PRODUCT_IMAGE,cp.CNUMBER,cp.PACKING_UNIT,cp.PRICE,cp.AMOUNT, f.FACTORY_NAME,f.CONTRACTOR,f.PHONE FROM (SELECT CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID,FACTORY_ID,CONTRACT_ID,PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_DESC,PRODUCT_IMAGE,CNUMBER,PACKING_UNIT,PRICE,AMOUNT FROM contract_product_c) cp LEFT JOIN (SELECT FACTORY_ID,FACTORY_NAME,CONTRACTOR,PHONE FROM factory_c) f ON cp.FACTORY_ID=f.FACTORY_ID ) cp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ep.EXT_CPRODUCT_ID,ep.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID,ep.PRODUCT_NO, ep.PRODUCT_DESC,ep.PRODUCT_IMAGE,ep.CNUMBER,ep.PACKING_UNIT,ep.PRICE,ep.AMOUNT, f.FACTORY_NAME,f.CONTRACTOR,f.PHONE FROM ( select EXT_CPRODUCT_ID,CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID,FACTORY_ID,PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_DESC,PRODUCT_IMAGE,CNUMBER,PACKING_UNIT,PRICE,AMOUNT FROM ext_cproduct_c) ep LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FACTORY_ID,FACTORY_NAME,CONTRACTOR,PHONE FROM factory_c ) f ON ep.FACTORY_ID=f.FACTORY_ID ) ep ON cp.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID=ep.CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID ) t ON c.CONTRACT_ID=t.CONTRACT_ID WHERE c.CONTRACT_ID=#{id}

SELECT cp.contract_product_id,cp.product_no,cp.cnumber, fc.factory_name, fc.CUSTOM_NAME,fc.CONTRACT_NO,fc.CONTRACT_ID,fc.DELIVERY_PERIOD,fc.SHIP_TIME,fc.TRADE_TERMS FROM ( SELECT contract_product_id,product_no,CONCAT(cnumber,PACKING_UNIT) AS CNUMBER FROM contract_product_c ) cp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.contract_product_id,f.factory_name, c.CUSTOM_NAME,c.CONTRACT_NO,c.CONTRACT_ID,c.DELIVERY_PERIOD,c.SHIP_TIME,c.TRADE_TERMS FROM ( SELECT cp.contract_product_id,f.factory_name FROM ( SELECT contract_product_id,factory_id from contract_product_c ) cp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT factory_id,factory_name from factory_c ) f ON cp.factory_id=f.factory_id ) f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cp.contract_product_id,c.CUSTOM_NAME,c.CONTRACT_NO,c.CONTRACT_ID,c.DELIVERY_PERIOD,c.SHIP_TIME,c.TRADE_TERMS FROM ( SELECT contract_product_id,CONTRACT_ID from contract_product_c ) cp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CUSTOM_NAME,CONTRACT_NO,CONTRACT_ID,DELIVERY_PERIOD,SHIP_TIME,TRADE_TERMS FROM contract_c ) c ON cp.CONTRACT_ID=c.CONTRACT_ID ) c ON f.contract_product_id=c.contract_product_id ) fc ON cp.contract_product_id=fc.contract_product_id where fc.SHIP_TIME like #{inputDate}

SELECT s.NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM ext_cproduct_c WHERE CONTRACT_PRODUCT_ID = #{contractProductId} ) e LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sys_code_id,ORDER_NO,NAME FROM sys_code_b WHERE parent_id="0104" ) s ON e.ctype=s.order_no
